availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Z. Duly (Carter County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Heba S. Hood Duly in Carter County, Kentucky, on November 29, 1855. Father of Heba Duly, Virginia Duly, Aurora Duly, John Duly. Farmer in Carter County in 1860. Employed John Warden as a farmhand in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 181.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, Precinct 1, p. 90A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Carter County Marriages, Film #001759301, p. 29-30.
Find A Grave, "John Zadock Duley (Sep. 8, 1827-Apr. 18, 1899)," Memorial #188130908 , http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/188130908 (accessed January 22, 2020).
